flounder.shaders

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.shaders.ShaderProgram

  • public class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a user-defined program designed to run on the graphics processor and manages loading, starting, stopping and cleaning uo.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShaderProgram(java.lang.String shaderName, MyFile vertexFile, MyFile fragmentFile)
      Creates a new shader program with a fragment and vertex shader.
      ShaderProgram(java.lang.String shaderName, java.lang.String vertexString, java.lang.String fragmentString)
      Creates a new shader program with a fragment and vertex shader.
